sentence.Network_en: We disturbed a wild boar that had been foraging by the roadside.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们惊动了一只一直在路边觅食的野猪。

sentence.Network_en: He was disturbed by the inaccuracy of the answers.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多答案都不准确，为此他感到很烦恼。

sentence.Network_en: She'd been working in her room till a noise had disturbed her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一直在房间里工作，直到有声响打扰了她。

entry.tran: 有精神病的;心理不正常的;精神紊乱的
entry.def: A disturbed person is very upset emotionally, and often needs special care or treatment.

example.tran: 致力于帮助情绪严重失常的孩子

example.ex: The murderer was apparently mentally disturbed.
example.tran: 该杀人犯显然精神失常。

entry.tran: 心神不安的;心烦意乱的;烦恼的
entry.def: You can say that someone is disturbed when they are very worried or anxious.

example.ex: Doctors were disturbed that less than 30 percent of the patients were women...
example.tran: 医生们焦虑不安，因为患者中有不到30%为女性。

example.ex: I was disturbed to hear that the selection committee originally decided not to send a British team to this year's Championships.
example.tran: 当我听说选拔委员会原本决定不派英国队去参加今年的锦标赛时，我觉得很不安。

entry.tran: 不幸的;多灾多难的;动荡不安的
entry.def: If you describe a situation or period of time as disturbed, you mean that it is unhappy and full of problems.

means.word_mean: 1. having the place or position changed;

sentences.sentence: "the disturbed books and papers on her desk"
"disturbed grass showed where the horse had passed"

means.word_mean: 2. afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief;

sentences.sentence: "one last worried check of the sleeping children"

means.word_mean: 3. emotionally unstable and having difficulty coping with personal relationships

auth_sentence.content: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.

auth_sentence.content: I am more disturbed now than I was before.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am more disturbed now than I was before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am more disturbed now than I was before.

auth_sentence.content: I am disturbed there has been no proper consultation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am disturbed there has been no proper consultation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am disturbed there has been no proper consultation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的
